resources.string: My name is Josue Dilmo dos Santos, I\'m 30 years old, Brazilian from Florianopolis, Santa Catarina. I\'ve been living in Dublin since 2016 and when I firstly arrived in here it was just to do an internship to study English. After few years living abroad in other countries, I realised that none of them gave me so many opportunities to keep progressing in life, whether through studies, work, travel, meeting people, cultures, and many other things. Now I\'m studying Computer Science at Dorset College and to be honest it\'s been a wonderful time. My favorite subjects are the ones related with programming, I don\'t have a favorite programming language but I\'m enjoying C#.

Name: Josue Dilmo dos Santos
